Description.Name: Kraken Good Time
Description.Details: You are on the bridge when Sumire calls out, "Commander, we have an incoming holovid transmission." You motion to Sumire to accept the transmission, "Greetings, Commander {COMMANDER.LastName}. Nice to see you again, I trust things have been well?" You let out a short laugh, "They were, until you called. Your so-called 'game' by the way, is so one-sided it's a joke. What is it you want this time?" Front Man smiles, "I am beginning to really like you, Commander!. Anyways, back to the reason I have contacted you. Please accept my apologies for interupting you yet again, but you seem to have employed yet another individual who owes me over ¢1,000,000. If you would please remand [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] over to me and I will be on my way." You look at the screen, "So I am to just take your word that [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] owes you this money? Even after all this time we do not even know who you really are!" Front Man smiles at you, "You can ask [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] yourself and should they choose to lie to you, not only will I be able to show you proof, you will have an indicator of the type of person they really are." [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] turns to you, "Commander, he speaks the truth. I have been running from them for a long time and if it wasn't for you and {COMPANY.CompanyName}, they would have found me a lot sooner. I cannot drag you into this so if they are now willing to wipe my debt AND reward you at the same time, then count me in!" You address Front Man, "So, you wish [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] to participate in another one of your games?" Front Man steeples his fingers in front of him, "Yes, Commander, it is as simple as allowing [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] to play in the game. As you know, winning the game will result in {SCN_MW.DET} debt being wiped and your company will receive a crate of 'goodies'." [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] yells out, "Count me..." You quickly interupt {SCN_MW.DET}, "The game uses the same odds as last time I presume?" Front Man smiles deliciously, "Nothing has changed from before aside from the contestants. Also, should [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] fail in achieving victory, their debt will be paid in a more permanent manner. Of course, you could just pay their debt instead." [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] grabs your arm, spinning you around, "Commander, I cannot keep running from them, and I don't want to be indebted to you more than I already am. I can win whatever 'game' they have planned. Let me do this!" "What is your decision, Commander?" says Front Man.

Description.Name: politely dismiss Front Man
Description.Details: You address Front Man, "Whilst we appreciate your intentions to keep things civil, it does not change the fact that you hacked into our comms system instead of contacting us through normal channels. [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] will remain in my employ and you can sort it out at the end of their contract." Front Man looks at you with displeasure, "This is a most unfortunate turn of events, Commander. Know this, we will get our money from [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]], with interest, and your company may end up as collateral damage as well." A scowl crosses your face, "Is that a threat?" Front Man, smiles at you, "Oh no, Commander. No threat at all. That is a promise." The image on the holocom winks out. Darius looks concerned, "Commander, is it wise to have a powerful organisation possibly looking for us?" "Darius," you state calmly, "If they were truely a threat, they would not have needed to go through us to get to [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] now would they?" Even then, you still wonder if you have heard the last from Front Man

Description.Name: Participate
Description.Details: You turn to [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]], "Are you sure you want to do this? It sounds VERY risky and dangerous, possibly even fatal." [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] looks you in the eye, full of confidence, "Commander, I know I can do this. My gambling habits and put me here, and there is no way I can earn the C-Bills to pay them off. I will win this and erase my debt once and for all." "Very well then." You spin around to address Front Man, "Okay, [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] agrees to particapte in your 'game'. Where are we headed to?" Front Man smiles, "My dear Commander, 'We' are not going anywhere, only [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] is leaving for the arena. The dropship Moirai is approaching even as we speak. Please allow it to dock with the Argo. Only [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] is allowed through the airlock onto the Moirai and anyone else caught trying to get on board will be dealt with severely." "And how will we know whether [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] passes your challenge?" you ask. "[[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] will return to you when the games are finished. Along with the applicable bonuses mentioned before," states Front Man at which point the holocom goes dark. With a nod of {SCN_MW.DET} head, [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] heads off down the corridor to board the Moirai. You sincerely hope you get to see {SCN_MW.DET} alive and well soon.

Description.Name: Buyout Marker
Description.Details: You look Front Man directly in the face, "How much?" Front Man looks intrigued, "How much for what, my dear Commander?" "How much to buy [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]]'s marker? No strings, no further obligations," you state succinctly. Front Man steeples his fingers, "You would be willing to bail [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] out of the hole they dug themselves into? Interesting... very well, if you wish to end this here an now it will cost you ¢1,500,000. My assistant has just sent you the account details." You turn to Darius, "Make the transfer." Darius types in some information into the console, then nods, "Transfer complete Commander." Front Man looks away for a minute before turning back to you, "The deal is done, Commander. You are an interesting one, I do so hope we meet again!" As you kill the connection, you state, "The feeling is NOT mutual." The holocom connection closes. [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] rushes over and grabs your hand, "Thank you! I... I do not know what to say!" You smile at [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]], "Just do your job and be the best MechWarrior you can. Oh, and no more gambling!" [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] cannot keep the smile of {SCN_MW.OBJ} face, "Absolutely Commander!"
